description: Have a wickedly fun time this Halloween by making this edible Jack-o'-lantern. The littlies will love this creepy creation made entirely of fresh fruit.
name: Fruity JackO'Lantern Recipe | Woolworths
recipeCategory: Kids light meal & snack,Fresh Food Kids,Kids snack
recipeIngredient: 1 small Royal Gala apple, cored, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Cut 3 orange wedges in half crossways. Using 1 orange wedge and 2 halved pieces, form an upsidedown hollow triangle on a shallow 26cm round dish. Repeat to form another hollow triangle (the hollow triangles act as the Jack-o’-lantern’s eyes). Repeat to form a smaller triangular nose.

Pack remaining orange wedges in and around eyes and nose, leaving a crescent shape for the mouth. Fill mouth area with apple slices. Fill eyes and nose area with blueberries. Use pear to form a stalk on top of Jacko’-lantern. Serve.
